content: Man falls down a thousand times. He should try to get-up, rise a thousand times, every time higher than from where he had fallen.
In this world the biggest looser is the one who has lost the zeal to live.
Set your own goals so that one day you can reach there; if you rely on someone to help you; then you will meet disappointment only.
Rise high, awaken the sleeping ones, follow the great & advance further.
